game.ai.shared.player

Class AbstractPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ai.shared.player.AbstractPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class AbstractPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayer
    This class extends from IPlayer, implement some methods shared by AIPlayer and HumanPlayer
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem
